channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 13:12 Air alert in Sumy region. Follow further messages.
item.description: 游댮 13:12 Air alert in Sumy region. Follow further messages. #Sumy_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游릭 13:06 Alarm lifted in Sumy region. Follow further messages.
item.description: 游릭 13:06 Alarm lifted in Sumy region. Follow further messages. #Sumy_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游댮 12:55 Threat of artillery shelling! Now there is artillery shelling in the Chervonohryhorivska territorial community. Go to shelter!
